recursive.tooltip: Dig through all the folders, mate

logging.tooltip: Save what we found to a file, yeah?

match_structure.tooltip: Keep your folders sorted just like they were

or_subfolders.tooltip: Sort your pics into separate folders for each OR search

search_positive.tooltip: Look in the positive prompt text

search_negative.tooltip: Look in the negative prompt text

case_sensitive.tooltip: Uppercase and lowercase letters are different, mate

tooltips.folder_path: Pick where your pics are at
tooltips.search_term: Type what you're after. Use && for AND, || for OR, * for wildcards
tooltips.ignore_term: Skip files with these words. Use && for AND, || for OR, * for wildcards
tooltips.copy_to: Where to copy the good ones
tooltips.move_to: Where to move the good ones
tooltips.regex_filter: Use regex to filter results (e.g. (?<!wo)man finds 'man' but not 'woman')

confirmations.move_message:
This'll move all your pics to the new spot.

Fair Dinkum?

warnings.multiple_or: Found too many ORs (|||), fixed it to ||
